trigger: New task assigned to you in a project
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time there is a new task assigned to you in the specified project on Asana.
This Trigger fires every time there is a new project added in a workspace.
This Trigger fires every time there is a new task in the project you specify.
This Trigger fires every time a tag is added to a task in a project.

trigger: New task completed in a project
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time there is a new completed task in a project.
